mapper.select:
select a.commodity_id commodityId, a.commodity_name commodityName, b.parent_name parentName, b.systematic_name systematicName, a.up_downstate upDownstate from t_commodity a left join t_commodity_classification b on b.systematic_code = a.systematic_code where a.is_delete = 0 and a.up_downstate = 1
and a.commodity_name like concat('%', #{commodityName}, '%')
and a.commodity_id = {#commodityId}
order by a.create_time desc
